Olamide Adu is the Founder and academic lead of EU StudyAssist. He is a freelance Data Scientist with background in Sustainable Forest and Nature Management, a recipient of the Erasmus Mundus Joint Master's Degree Sustainable Forest and Nature Management (EMJMD SUFONAMA) program from the Swedish University of Agricultural Sciences in 2023. A passionate Data Science with love for growth and learning new things and a big lover of R programming Language.
